title: The benefits of doing nothing
description: Would being lazy have a purpose in life?

vocabItems.definition: stop doing things and relax completely
group of certain animals, birds or insects that live together
able to produce a lot for the amount of resources used

vocabItems.word: necessity is the mother of invention
vocabItems.definition: (idiom) meaning that if you really need to do something, you will think of a way of doing it
stop worrying or thinking about something, and relax
